original: Milindapañha
analyzed: milindapañha

original: Anumānapañha
analyzed: anumāna pañha

original: Vessantaravagga
analyzed: vessantara vagga

original: 12. Nibbānasannihitapañha
“Bhante nāgasena, atthi so padeso puratthimāya vā disāya dakkhiṇāya vā disāya pacchimāya vā disāya uttarāya vā disāya uddhaṁ vā adho vā tiriyaṁ vā, yattha nibbānaṁ sannihitan”ti?
analyzed: bhante nāgasena atthi saḥ padeso puratthimāya vā disāya dakkhiṇāya vā disāya pacchimāya vā disāya uttarāya vā disāya uddham vā adhas vā tiriyam vā yattha nibbānam sannihitanti

original: “Natthi, mahārāja, so padeso puratthimāya vā disāya dakkhiṇāya vā disāya pacchimāya vā disāya uttarāya vā disāya uddhaṁ vā adho vā tiriyaṁ vā, yattha nibbānaṁ sannihitan”ti.
analyzed: na atthi mahā rāja saḥ padesaḥ puratthimāya vā disāya dakkhiṇāya vā disāya pacchimāya vā disāya uttarāya vā disāya uddham vā adhas vā tiriyam vā yattha nibbānam sannihitanti

original: “Yadi, bhante nāgasena, natthi nibbānassa sannihitokāso, tena hi natthi nibbānaṁ?
analyzed: yadi bhante nāgasena na atthi nibbānassa sannihita ukāsaḥ tena hi na atthi nibbāna

original: Yesañca taṁ nibbānaṁ sacchikataṁ, tesampi sacchikiriyā micchā, kāraṇaṁ tattha vakkhāmi.
analyzed: yesam ca tam nibbānam tesam pi sacchikiriyā micchā kāraṇam tattha vakkhāmi

original: Yathā, bhante nāgasena, mahiyā dhaññuṭṭhānaṁ khettaṁ atthi, gandhuṭṭhānaṁ pupphaṁ
analyzed: yathā bhante nāgasena mahiyā dhaññu ṭṭhānam khettam atthi gandhu ṭṭhānam puppha

original: atthi, pupphuṭṭhānaṁ gumbo atthi, phaluṭṭhānaṁ rukkho atthi, ratanuṭṭhānaṁ ākaro
analyzed: atthi pupphu ṭṭhānam gumbaḥ atthi phalu ṭṭhānam rukkhaḥ atthi ratanu ṭṭhānam ākaro

original: atthi, tattha yo koci yaṁ yaṁ icchati, so tattha gantvā taṁ taṁ harati;
analyzed: atthi tattha yaḥ koci yam yam icchati saḥ tattha gantvā tam tam harati

original: evameva kho, bhante nāgasena, yadi nibbānaṁ atthi, tassa nibbānassa uṭṭhānokāsopi
analyzed: evam eva kho bhante nāgasena yadi nibbānam atthi tassa nibbānassa uṭṭhāna ukāsaḥ api

original: icchitabbo, yasmā ca kho, bhante nāgasena, nibbānassa uṭṭhānokāso natthi, tasmā natthi
analyzed: icchitabbaḥ yasmā ca kho bhante nāgasena nibbānassa uṭṭhāna ukāsaḥ natthi tasmā natthi

original: nibbānanti brūmi, yesañca nibbānaṁ sacchikataṁ, tesampi sacchikiriyā micchā”ti.
analyzed: nibbānam ti brūmi yesam ca nibbānam tesam pi sacchikiriyā micchāti

original: “Natthi, mahārāja, nibbānassa sannihitokāso, atthi cetaṁ nibbānaṁ, sammāpaṭipanno yoniso manasikārena nibbānaṁ sacchikaroti.
analyzed: natthi mahā rāja nibbānassa sannihita ukāsaḥ atthi ca itam nibbāna sammāpaṭipannaḥ yonisas manasikārena nibbānam sacchikaroti

original: Yathā pana, mahārāja, atthi aggi nāma, natthi tassa sannihitokāso, dve kaṭṭhāni saṅghaṭṭento aggiṁ adhigacchati;
analyzed: yathā pana mahā rāja atthi aggi nāma na atthi tassa sannihita ukāsaḥ dve kaṭṭhāni saṅghaṭṭentaḥ aggim adhigacchati

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, atthi nibbānaṁ, natthi tassa sannihitokāso, sammāpaṭipanno yoniso manasikārena nibbānaṁ sacchikaroti.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja atthi nibbāna natthi tassa sannihita ukāsaḥ sammāpaṭipannaḥ yonisas manasikārena nibbānam sacchikaroti

original: Yathā vā pana, mahārāja, atthi satta ratanāni nāma.
analyzed: yathā vā pana mahā rāja atthi satta ratanāni nāma

original: Seyyathidaṁ—
analyzed: seyyathida

original: cakkaratanaṁ hatthiratanaṁ assaratanaṁ maṇiratanaṁ itthiratanaṁ gahapatiratanaṁ pariṇāyakaratanaṁ.
analyzed: cakka ratanam hatthi ratanam assa ratanam maṇi ratanam itthi ratanam gahapati ratanam pariṇāyaka ratana

original: Na ca tesaṁ ratanānaṁ sannihitokāso atthi, khattiyassa pana sammāpaṭipannassa paṭipattibalena tāni ratanāni upagacchanti.
analyzed: na ca tesam ratanānam sannihita ukāsaḥ atthi khattiyassa pana sammāpaṭipannassa paṭipatti balena tāni ratanāni upagacchanti

original: Evameva kho, mahārāja, atthi nibbānaṁ, natthi tassa sannihitokāso, sammāpaṭipanno yoniso manasikārena nibbānaṁ sacchikarotī”ti.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja atthi nibbāna na atthi tassa sannihita ukāsaḥ sammāpaṭipannaḥ yonisas manasikārena nibbānam sacchikaroti iti

original: “Bhante nāgasena, nibbānassa sannihitokāso mā hotu, atthi pana taṁ ṭhānaṁ, yattha ṭhito sammāpaṭipanno nibbānaṁ sacchikarotī”ti?
analyzed: bhante nāgasena nibbānassa sannihita ukāsaḥ mā hotu atthi pana tat ṭhāna yattha ṭhitaḥ sammāpaṭipannaḥ nibbānam sacchikaroti iti

original: “Āma, mahārāja, atthi taṁ ṭhānaṁ, yattha ṭhito sammāpaṭipanno nibbānaṁ sacchikarotī”ti.
analyzed: āma mahā rāja atthi tat ṭhāna yattha ṭhitaḥ sammāpaṭipannaḥ nibbānam sacchikaroti iti

original: “Katamaṁ pana, bhante, taṁ ṭhānaṁ, yattha ṭhito sammāpaṭipanno nibbānaṁ sacchikarotī”ti?
analyzed: katamam pana bhante tam ṭhāna yattha ṭhitaḥ sammāpaṭipannaḥ nibbānam sacchikaroti iti

original: “Sīlaṁ, mahārāja, ṭhānaṁ, sīle patiṭṭhito yoniso manasikaronto sakkayavanepi cīnavilātepi
analyzed: sīla mahā rāja ṭhāna sīle patiṭṭhitaḥ yonisas manasikaronto sakka yavane pi cīna vilāte pi

original: alasandepi nigumbepi kāsikosalepi kasmīrepi gandhārepi nagamuddhanipi brahmalokepi
analyzed: alasande pi nigumbe pi kāsikosale pi kasmīre gandhāre pi nagamuddhani pi brahmaloke pi

original: yattha katthacipi ṭhito sammāpaṭipanno nibbānaṁ sacchikaroti.
analyzed: yattha katthacipi ṭhitaḥ sammāpaṭipannaḥ nibbānam sacchikaroti

original: Yathā, mahārāja, yo koci cakkhumā puriso sakayavanepi cīnavilātepi alasandepi nigumbepi
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja yaḥ koci cakkhumā purisaḥ sa ka yavane pi cīnavilāte pi alasande pi nigumbe pi

original: kāsikosalepi kasmīrepi gandhārepi nagamuddhanipi brahmalokepi yattha katthacipi ṭhito ākāsaṁ passati;
analyzed: kāsi kosale pi kasmīre pi gandhāre pi brahma loke pi yattha katthacipi ṭhitaḥ ākāsam passati

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, sīle patiṭṭhito yoniso manasikaronto sakayavanepi …pe…
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja sīle patiṭṭhitaḥ yonisas manasikaronto saka yavane pi pe

original: yattha katthacipi ṭhito sammāpaṭipanno nibbānaṁ sacchikaroti.
analyzed: yattha katthacipi ṭhitaḥ sammāpaṭipannaḥ nibbānam sacchikaroti

original: Yathā vā pana, mahārāja, sakayavanepi …pe…
analyzed: yathā vā pana mahā rāja saka yavane pi

original: yattha katthacipi ṭhitassa pubbadisā atthi;
analyzed: yattha katthacipi ṭhitassa pubbadisā atthi

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, sīle patiṭṭhitassa yoniso manasikarontassa sakkayavanepi …pe…
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja sīle patiṭṭhitassa yonisas manasikarontassa sakka yavane pi pe

original: yattha katthacipi ṭhitassa sammāpaṭipannassa atthi nibbānasacchikiriyā”ti.
analyzed: yattha katthacipi ṭhitassa sammāpaṭipannassa atthi nibbāna sacchikiriyā ti

original: “Sādhu, bhante nāgasena, desitaṁ tayā nibbānaṁ, desitā nibbānasacchikiriyā, parikkhatā
analyzed: sādhu bhante nāgasena desitam tayā nibbāna desitā nibbāna sacchikiriyā parikkhatā

original: sīlaguṇā, dassitā sammāpaṭipatti, ussāpito dhammaddhajo, saṇṭhapitā dhammanetti,
analyzed: sīla guṇā dassitā sammā paṭipatti ussāpitaḥ dhamma ddhajaḥ saṇṭhapitā dhamma netti

original: avañjho suppayuttānaṁ sammāpayogo, evametaṁ gaṇivarapavara tathā sampaṭicchāmī”ti.
analyzed: avañjhaḥ su payuttānam sammā apayogaḥ evam etam gaṇi vara pavara tathā sampaṭicchāmi iti

original: Nibbānasannihitapañho dvādasamo.
analyzed: nibbāna sannihita pañhaḥ dvādasamaḥ

original: Vessantaravaggo tatiyo.
analyzed: vessantara vaggo tatiyaḥ

original: Imasmiṁ vagge dvādasa pañhā.
analyzed: imasmin vagge dvādasa pañhā
